arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham to be benched for England vs Serbia after Thomas Tuchel warning
arts.sum: England face Serbia in the first of two World Cup qualifiers in the November international break and Real Madrid star Jude Bellingham is expected to start on the bench

arts.ttl: Why Jude Bellingham Is on the Bench for England vs. Serbia
arts.sum: Rogers has started England’s last three matches, including September’s 5–0 demolition of Serbia, and Tuchel admitted prior to Thursday’s fixture that the Villa attacking midfielder could not feature alongside Bellingham in England’s current system. England manager Thomas Tuchel has not always seen eye-to-eye with the midfielder since the German’s appointment at the beginning of the calendar year, with Bellingham having played just four times for the Three Lions in 2025.

arts.ttl: How to watch England vs Serbia for free - TV channel, live stream, kick-off info
arts.sum: England will take on Serbia on Thursday, with Thomas Tuchel's Three Lions having already secured their place at next summer's World Cup

arts.ttl: England vs Serbia live: Bellingham and Foden eye returns to line-up in World Cup 2026 qualifier
arts.sum: The Three Lions have already secured a spot at the World Cup but will want to continue their winning momentum

arts.ttl: How to watch England v Serbia on TV tonight for free - channel and kick-off time
arts.sum: Here's everything you need to know about the upcoming clash at Wembley

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham poised for substitute role in England’s game against Serbia
arts.sum: Morgan Rogers expected to keep place at No 10 Guéhi in line to join Scott in not making match squad Jude Bellingham is poised to start on the bench for England’s World Cup qualifier against Serbia on Thursday, with Thomas Tuchel expected to keep faith with Morgan Rogers in the No 10 role. Bellingham has missed England’s past four games but has been recalled for this week’s internationals against Serbia and Albania. The 22-year-old midfielder is one of four No 10s in the squad and has been pushing for a space in the starting lineup. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Kane aiming to join Crouch and Charlton scoring club in England vs. Serbia
arts.sum: England skipper Harry Kane can join Wayne Rooney, Peter Crouch and Sir Bobby Charlton in an exclusive scoring club when Thomas Tuchel's men host Serbia on Thursday evening.

arts.ttl: England vs. Serbia: Kick-off time, how to watch, stats
arts.sum: England host Serbia in their penultimate World Cup qualifying clash on Thursday as Thomas Tuchel's side aim to maintain their perfect record in Group K.

arts.ttl: Two England stars left out of squad to face Serbia by Thomas Tuchel
arts.sum: There isn't room for every member of Thomas Tuchel's full England squad in the matchday selection, meaning two players will need to watch from the sidelines against Serbia

arts.ttl: Scott left out of England squad for Serbia match
arts.sum: Uncapped Bournemouth midfielder Alex Scott is left out of the 23-man England squad for Thursday's World Cup qualifier against Serbia at Wembley.
